thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Revance Reports Qtrly Net Loss Per Share Attributable To Common Stockholders $1.14

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Revance Reports Qtrly Net Loss Per Share Attributable To Common Stockholders $1.14
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Revance Therapeutics Inc:
* REVANCE RELEASES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* REVANCE THERAPEUTICS INC - ‍REITERATES ITS FINANCIAL GUIDANCE PROVIDED IN JANUARY 2018​
* REVANCE THERAPEUTICS INC - QTRLY BASIC AND DILUTED NET LOSS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS $1.14
* REVANCE THERAPEUTICS INC - ‍EXPECTS CASH BURN FOR 2018 TO BE IN RANGE OF $117 TO $137 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
